name: Intro to deep learning with Pytorch
title: Intro to deep learning with Pytorch
description: Join Luis Serrano in this Udacity course to explore deep learning with PyTorch, from basic concepts to hands-on model training. Gain practical skills to create and deploy powerful AI models

name: Learn PyTorch for Deep Learning
title: Learn PyTorch for Deep Learning
description: Learn PyTorch for deep learning with Daniel Bourke, building skills through practical coding. Create and apply your own projects with confidence.

name: :Pytorch Essential training with deep learning
title: :Pytorch Essential training with deep learning
description: Master deep learning with PyTorch in this LinkedIn Learning course by Terezija Semenski, featuring hands-on coding challenges to boost your skills..

name: Hands_on pytorch Machine Learning
title: Hands_on pytorch Machine Learning
description: Get hands-on with PyTorch and machine learning in this course by Helen Sun, learning to build efficient models for real-world applications.

name: Natural Learning Processing with Pytorch
title: Natural Learning Processing with Pytorch
description: Explore natural language processing with PyTorch in this course by Zhongyu Pan, covering text transformation, model building, and tuning for better results.
